documents.document: @Bexhill2Bexhill @sontagdaily @Spooniehacker @chronicinclude @sineadgleeson It's out early March I think (I read a proof)

@Bexhill2Bexhill @sontagdaily @Spooniehacker @chronicinclude You would probably really appreciate Constellations by @sineadgleeson.It's a collection of linked essays focusing on gendered experiences of pain, illness, the body & perhaps most of all (for me) different ideas of what is left behind
As soon as I can I'm going to Dalkeith in search of a birling oak tree that someone posted a picture of on Instagram. Evidence perhaps of life as computer simulation.
